snippet: With expert help, the cast and crew of the Broadway play “The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time” have softened its sensory edges for an audience within the autism spectrum.
abstract: Theater Development Fund's Autism Theater Initiative and Britain’s National Theater will present 'relaxed performance' of play The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time aimed at audience of people on autism spectrum.
lead_paragraph: With expert help, the cast and crew of the Broadway play “The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time” have softened its sensory edges for an audience within the autism spectrum.
